fields.name: Name
fields.label: Label
fields.noEmptyString: Empty string value is not allowed
fields.currentUserAsDefault: Set current user as default value

messages.thousandSeparatorEqualsDecimalMark: The thousands separator character can not be the same as the decimal point character.
messages.selectEntityType: Select the entity type in the left menu.
messages.selectLayout: Select the layout in the left menu and edit it.
messages.incorrectThousandSeparatorOrDecimalMark: Only the following delimiters are allowed: '.' and ','.
messages.rebuildDb: Are you sure you want to rebuild the database structure? All unused columns and tables will be removed.

descriptions.locale: Manage locale settings such as language, date and time format, decimal mark, thousend separator, as well as locale-spesific measure units
descriptions.inputLanguage: Activate multilinguality and choose additional languages to manage your data
descriptions.multiLanguagesSettings: Configure additional languages to be used
descriptions.composer: Dependency consistent installation / uninstallation / updating of modules
descriptions.representationSettings: Manage general settings and preferences for data representation
descriptions.measure: Manage your mesures and measure units, set default measure units and multipliers for automatic measure unit conversion
descriptions.connection: Manage connections with other systems for automatic data exchange
descriptions.settings: Manage general system settings such as default system locale, search preferences, asset duplicate control, active interface languages, cache usage and more...
descriptions.scheduledJob: Manage scheduled (like a cron job) system jobs executed in the background and see their logs
descriptions.clearCache: Clear metadata cache and other system cache, use this option if you have errors while working with the system
descriptions.rebuildDb: Align the database structure in accordance with the configured metadata
descriptions.users: Manage system users, their preferences, roles and teams as well as validate their access level and permissions for all entities
descriptions.teams: Manage teams and user assignment to teams
descriptions.roles: Manage roles – set permissions (create, read, write and delete) and access levels (own, team-related or all records) for all entities in the system, define specific permissions for single fields
descriptions.portals: Manage portals to give limited access to your system and data to external collaborators – photographs, translators, suppliers, distributors, customers, retailers and others
descriptions.layoutManager: Layouts customization (list, detail, edit, search, mass update, etc.)
descriptions.entityManager: AtroCore entity creation, editing and removing as well as management of the entity fields and relations
descriptions.authTokens: Active authorization sessions, including IP address and last access date
descriptions.attachments: All file attachments stored in the system.
